Computer - EnabledInDisabledOU.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Computer enabled in disabled OU
Computer - EnabledInDisabledOU.Description: Please disable the computer account in AD.

GitUser - NoManger.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: GIT account without manager
GitUser - NoManger.Description: Please add the correct manager for the GIT account.

Group - CircularGroups.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Group with circular membership
Group - CircularGroups.Description: Please check the group for members. This group is also member of one of the member groups.

Group - GroupsWithOrphans.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Group with orphaned member
Group - GroupsWithOrphans.Description: Please remove the member account that is no longer a valid AD account.

Group - NonTraversableGroups.Description: Please remove members from the group that are not contoso.NET domain accounts.

RolGroup - CN.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Group name and cn not equal
RolGroup - CN.Description: Please correct the 'Name' or 'Common Name' property of the ROL group so they are both the same.

RolGroup - GroupCategory.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Group category not of type 'security'
RolGroup - GroupCategory.Description: Please correct the group property 'Category' to 'Security'.

RolGroup - GroupScope.Description: Please correct the group property 'Group scope' to 'Universal'.

RolGroup - PlaceHolder.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Placeholder account missing in ROL group

User - CountryNotMatchingOU.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User country not equal to the OU country
User - CountryNotMatchingOU.Description: Please correct the property 'Country' of the user to be the same as the AD organizational unit where the user account is located.

User - DisplayNameNotUnique.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User display name not unique
User - DisplayNameNotUnique.Description: Please correct the property 'DisplayName' of the user so it is unique.

User - EmployeeTypeBlank.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User employee type is missing

User - HomeDircontoso.Description: Please update the 'HomeDirectory' so it starts with '\\contoso.NET\' instead of '\\contoso\'

User - ManagerOfSelf.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User is manager of his own account
User - ManagerOfSelf.Description: Please fill in the correct manager for the user.

User - NoManager.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User has no manager
User - NoManager.Description: Please fill in the correct manager for the user.

User - StartEndWithSpaces.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User first or last name incorrect
User - StartEndWithSpaces.Description: Please remove the space at the beginning or end of the first or last name of the user.

User - TSHomeDircontoso.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: TS home dir contoso not contoso.NET
User - TSHomeDircontoso.Description: Please update the terminal services profile folder to use 'contoso.NET' instead of 'contoso'.

User - TSProfilecontoso.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User terminal services profile incorrect
User - TSProfilecontoso.Description: Please change the terminal services profile to use 'contoso.NET' instead of 'contoso'.

User - VendorsNotExpiring.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: Vendor account expiration date incorrect
User - VendorsNotExpiring.Description: Please set the account expiration date to be less than one year from now.

User - LogonScriptNotExisting.ShortDescription: AD Inconsistency: User logon script not found
User - LogonScriptNotExisting.Description: Please update the user logon script to an existing path ('\\CONTOSO.NET\NETLOGON\..') or make it blank when no logon script is needed.
